name: Chris Winning Prototypes
description:
All of these "Games" require a keyboard and mouse for input.

Experimental Games Prototype_01 - 2 Player - Players control colored balls and move through a tunnel avoiding hazards and scoring points by matching their colour with the colour of spinning Ying-Yang wheels.

Experimental Games Prototype_02 - 1 Player - The player controls a space man and move through a ship that is falling apart. The must avoid holes in the spaceship or be sucked into space.

Experimental Games Prototype_03 - 3 Player - Players control an avatar and race against each other to reach the finish line, but be careful that the wolf doesn't see you or get pushed back a space.

Experimental Games Prototype_04 - 1 Player - Players control a turret using a cut out image as a target and another to spawn enemies. The player then uses their voice to control the direction of the turret's barrel and which also fires on voice command.
